author: GamingBolt
description:
Atomfall Red Strain is a pretty notable improvement from The Wicked Isle DLC. The new zone is much more interesting to explore and the added enemy types and fresh weaponry is more dynamic and fun. 

And while some old woes remain unchanged here, there’s at least far less backtracking this time around. If you only have the budget to pick up one DLC for Atomfall, The Red Strain is the better option of the two.
title: Atomfall: The Red Strain DLC Review - The Final Verdict

author: GamingBolt
description:
Helldivers 2 continues to build on its unexpected success with its launch on Xbox, and it’s a better time than ever to jump into the Galactic War and spread Managed Democracy. 

Even though it may be an overwhelming amount of content for solo players and newcomers, especially with its Warbonds, this is the type of multiplayer shooter that makes me want to continue progressing long past the point where I unlock every Stratagem or without purchasing a new battle pass. 

Helldivers 2 makes it as fun as possible to send in bombs and rain down bullets on hordes of bugs and robots, and it’s about time we get back to the Galactic War and continue fighting for Liberty.
title: This Former PS5 Console Exclusive Is Just As Explosive On Xbox...

author: GamingBolt
description:
Little Nightmares 3 is poised to redefine the much-loved horror platformer’s formula. The familiar ingredients are still here: grotesque monsters, surreal environments, and signature suffocating atmospheres, but with a new studio at the helm in Supermassive Games. 

The biggest change is the inclusion of fully-fledged co-operative gameplay, a community requested feature that has forced a ground-up re-think on puzzle design, combat encounters, and exploration. 

Players now control a brand new duo of unfortunate heroes - Low and Alone - each equipped with their own signature item that’ll prove crucial to the pair surviving the lurid nightmare in which they’ve awakened. Sinister new Residents conjure themes of authority and anxiety, whilst a post-launch model is set to continue the story beyond the threequel. 

This video outlines 15 key differences between Little Nightmares 3 and its predecessor, and what this means for new and returning fans.
title: Little Nightmares 3 vs. Little Nightmares 2 - 15 Biggest Differences You Need To Know

author: GamingBolt
description:
It's no surprise that Dying Light: The Beast is doing as well as it is. It's a solid survival horror experience that brings new additions to the franchise's unique formula while retaining everything that has had its fans stoked for Kyle Crane's return to the fold. But what exactly has Techland done to make this one among the franchise's best?

Fortunately, that's a very easy question to answer, and we're stoked to bring you our take on why The Beast has millions of gamers out there in the wilds of the Castor Woods, taking on the Infected while gathering supplies, and uncovering a story filled with twists and turns you never see coming. 

Dive in and find out just why Dying Light: The Beast is definitely worth all the hype and positive attention.
title: Why Are MILLIONS Addicted To Dying Light: The Beast?
